title: Exploring the Relationships Between The Calories in a Recipe vs. the Average Rating
description: Exploring the relationship between nutrients and ratings in food recipes offers invaluable insights for both health-conscious individuals and culinary enthusiasts. While the nutritional value of food is dependent on a variety of nutrients, our analysis will specifically consider calorie count, as it is a common nutrition-tracking method. We aimed to explore whether the calorie count of the food makes the recipe more or less appealing to people based on its average rating.

title: N-Gram language Model
description: Built and analyzed language models by dissecting a text corpus, implementing uniform and unigram models, and creating an N-gram model for probability computation and text generation.

title: Loan Applications
description: Explored how various borrower characteristics are related to one another, in an attempt to better understand the complexity behind loans.

title: MTS Bus Transit Network Analysis
description: Conducted a detailed analysis of the bus transit network, allowing for visualization of routes, optimization of travel times, and understanding of transit patterns.

title: Image Transformations
description: Implemented core image processing functionality in Python, including brightness adjustment, rotation, blurring, and K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) classification of images based on pixel similarity.

title: The Great British Bake Off Analysis
description: Analyzed the Great British Bake Off dataset to explore the relationship between contestants' characteristics and their success in the competition. The analysis included data cleaning, visualization, and statistical modeling.

title: Taylor Swift Analysis and Reccommendation Tool
description: Developed data visualizations, a song recommendation engine, lyric search functionality, and keyword analysis for Taylor Swiftâ€™s discography.

title: Nutritional Analysis of Grocery Stores
description: Performed a nutritional analysis of food products in three different grocery stores - Target, Walmart, and Whole Foods.

title: Environmental Expenditures and Climate Readiness
description: Compared data visualizations supporting opposing positions on the relationship between a government's annual environmental expenditure and a country's climate readiness.
